definition: Eustachian tube (linking pharynx 咽 to tympanic cavity 鼓室 of middle ear)/auditory tube
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The patency of the eustachian tube is compromised.
Eustachian tube function can be restored so that is conducive to healing of otitis media.
sentences.chinese: 能够让咽鼓管的功能得到恢复，有利于中耳炎的痊愈。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of tympanic administration through eustachian tube in treating middle ear adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨经咽鼓管鼓室注药治疗粘连性中耳炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the application of ventilatory function examination of auditory tube in the physical examination for pilot recruitment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨咽鼓管通气功能检查法在招飞体检中的应用。

definition: external auditory meatus/auditory canal, between the outer ear 外耳 and tympanum 鼓膜
internal auditory meatus (canal in temporal bone of skull housing auditory nerves)
